trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Megadja a beszédfelismerés összefoglaló Markup Language (SSML) művelet megjelenítés végrehajtását egy adott <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> karbantartáshoz kérelmek jelenti.

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A műveletek az SSML-specifikációt elemeinek leginkább megfelelő, és a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> tulajdonsága</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> által visszaadott szöveg vannak megvalósítva

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A TtsEngineAction rendelt érték, amely egy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>ad vissza a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: A TtsEngineAction által visszaadott érték feldolgozása a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonság végzi el a beszédfelismerés synthesizes <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> -ból származtatott osztályt metódus</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> megvalósítása</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> könyvjelző szerint használható.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Megfelel-e a `<mark>` XML-címke a SSML-specifikációnak.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy semmilyen műveletet az SSML-bemenet meghatározása.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: A társított <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>az ismeretlen XML-címke nem része az SSML-szabvány.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: A bemeneti értelmezi vagy egy összefoglaló motor belátása figyelmen kívül.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Bemeneti kérelmek <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> szöveg Fonémák hibaként értelmezi.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pontos kiejtését megadja a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>tagja a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>által visszaadott objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonságának <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>példányok.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Megfelel-e a `<Phoneme>` XML-címke a SSML-specifikációnak.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy egy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> nem beszéd megjelenítendő szöveget tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Megadja a csend időtartama a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>az ő tagja <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>által visszaadott objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonságának <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>példányok.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Megfelel-e a `<Silence>` XML-címke a SSML-specifikációnak.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Kéri, hogy a társított <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> kell feldolgozni, és szóbeli.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Ez az az alapértelmezett érték a TtsEngineAction egy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, megfelel-e a `<speak>` az SSML-specifikációt XML-címke</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Azt jelzi, hogy a szöveges értékek által biztosított egy <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> keresztül a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>tulajdonság az egyes karakter lehet szintetizálásához.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: A Megjelenítés írásjelek, csak üres karaktereket, valamint alfanumerikus szöveget tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Ezekkel a kapcsolódó, például szövegtöredék "szó."

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: synthsized be kell lennie "w o r d felkiáltójel".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Bekezdés állapotát jelzi.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Megfelel-e a `

` XML-címke az SSML-specifikációja

trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Mondat kezdetét jelzi.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Megfelel-e a `<s>` XML-címke az SSML-specifikációja
